title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 8-1.33 - Slack cable stopping device
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 8-1.33 - Slack cable stopping device

State Regulations

All elevators using a winding drum shall be provided
with a slack cable device which will automatically cut off the power and stop
the machine in case the hoisting cables or chains become slack. Exception: (1)

Existing belt or chain driven elevators. (2)

Sidewalk elevators. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
8-1.33

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
